attributes.action: MPs to debate firing Boris Johnson and his cabinet
attributes.additional_details: The electorate have had enough of his lies, disdain for the working class, tax rises, cronyism and wasting of tax-payers money. We are done.
attributes.background: We want MPs to debate the viability of keeping Boris Johnson and his crony cabinet in office

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
